title: Episode #30. Q and A with Hampton Native, Sara Holstein Graves, Brings Some New Insight
description:
We bring back Sara Holstein Graves, a Hampton native, historian and genealogist, to share insights into the Murdaugh family. She gives us some information that had we had not heard anywhere about the murders, and other crimes.


Support this podcast at — https://redcircle.com/the-murdaugh-family-murders-impact-of-influence/donations
